formula: E.g.f. arcsinh(sin(arctan(x))) = arcsinh(x/(1+x^2)^(1/2)).arcsinh(x/(1+x^2)^(1/2)) = x/sqrt(1+x^2)*(1 - x^2/(G(0)+x^2)) where G(k) = 4*k^2 + k*(10+6*x^2) + 5*x^2 + 6 + 2*x^2*(1+x^2)*(k+1)*(2*k+3)^3/G(k+1) ; (continued fraction, Euler's 1st kind, 1-step). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Aug 08 2012a(n) ~ (-1)^(n+1) * 2^(3*n-1) * n^(2*n-2) / exp(2*n). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 30 2013
author: Patrick Demichel (patrick.demichel(AT)hp.com)
extensions: Confirmed by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 17 2011
